modName: Realistic Sun for Climates of Tamriel and Vanilla
summary: Ultra realistic Sun & Sunglare textures for CoT and Vanilla
descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic]Yes, yes, I hear you thinking... [I]Another sun!... Meh![/I] Yes indeed, another sun replacer. Yet I would give it a go :)

Oh we now have a video :) Thanks to deathneko11 from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450/]The Realistic Lighting Team[/url]

[youtube]413eX-f4kxM[/youtube]


I'm not going to write a lot here besides a few points on how this works, or works differently from other sun replacers. I think the mod is straight forward enough for that ;)

This mod replaces the sun/sunglare and modifies the textures in this way;
• Added the sunglare to sun texture which freed up the sunglare.dds to add an overlay effect. Sunglare is pretty much only visible during sunrise/sunset events in game
• Shifted each RGB by 0.3 degrees to the right to add a slight color spectrum around the sun (in the glares)
• Placed the alpha equal to the blue channel to give a very minor chromatic effect, which should hardly be noticeable
• Various little touches left and right to give the best effect
• Each file is DTX5 compressed and 2048x2048 in size

This used to be a part of my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39799/]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch - Fog Rain Overcast[/url] but I decided to release the added sun/sunglare as a separate mod as well as one can never have enough choices ;)

In the downloads you can find a Vanilla and Climates of Tamriel version, but both are the same textures, just the installation directory is different as Climates of Tamriel uses a custom folder structure.

I suggest use with ENB as it handles the sun so much better. You might need to tweak a little bit in case you use a custom sun already.

This sun replacer is recommended to use/already included in the following ENB's
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30936/]RealVision ENB by SkyrimTuner[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39013/]Kountervibe ENB Extensive by Kyokushinoyama _ --JawZ-- _ Solsikke737[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38944/]K ENB Extensive by Kyokushinoyama _ --JawZ-- _ Solsikke737[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38917/]The Wilds ENB (re-uploaded version, not original) by Skysan4298[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48730/]Skylight ENB by Aiyen[/url]

If you are an ENB author and want to simplify installation and are currently linking this sun replacer, simply drop me a PM and give proper credits on your ENB page.

I hope you enjoy it! And thank you all for your wonderful feedback! Very much appreciated!!
Peace out, prod


[color=darkorange]Some comparison shots with Climates of Tamriel[/color]
